name: Goober Dash
description:
Welcome to Goober Dash, an adrenaline pumping Race Royale, pitting 32 players against each other on hundreds of hand-crafted courses full of hazards to avoid and shortcuts to discover! Play as adorable, customizable characters known as Goobers and run, jump & dash your way to victory. Dash to outmaneuver your opponents, smash through obstacles, or take down rivals in this action-packed race to the finish line!

Customize your Goober with a variety of items to make them stand out in the crowd! Collect outfits, emotes, and even unique reactions and celebrations to make your Goober expressive and distinctly unique!




Dive into the Course Creator to design your own race tracks that you can play against your friends, and submit to the community level database. Top rated community levels that get added to the game earn their creators rewards like gems, exclusive skins and badges, and an honorary role within the community, so get building!




Compete for glory in the time trials mode, where global best times leaderboards await. Prove your skills and climb the ranks to become the ultimate Goober Dash champion. Collect medals for performing well in these time trials and showcase your achievements as a testament to your Goober racing prowess.

Get ready to dash, create, and conquer in Goober Dash – the battle royale platformer that's as creative as it is competitive!
